meanings.sent1: She flaunts her new dress at the party.
meanings.sent2: He always flaunts his wealth with expensive cars.
meanings.sent3: The peacock flaunts its colorful feathers to attract a mate.
meanings.sent4: The artist flaunts her creativity in every brushstroke.
meanings.sent5: The sun flaunts its brilliance in the clear blue sky.

meanings.definition: Show off in a conspicuous or boastful manner
meanings.sent1: The child flaunts his toy to his friends.
meanings.sent2: She flaunts her knowledge in every conversation.
meanings.sent3: The magician flaunts his tricks to impress the audience.
meanings.sent4: The athlete flaunts his skills on the field.
meanings.sent5: The peacock flaunts its beauty in the garden.

meanings.definition: To parade or exhibit oneself conspicuously
meanings.sent1: The model flaunts down the runway with confidence.
meanings.sent2: He flaunts his achievements during the presentation.
meanings.sent3: The peacock flaunts around the zoo, captivating visitors.
meanings.sent4: The actor flaunts his talent on the big screen.
meanings.sent5: The flower flaunts its vibrant colors in the garden.
